name: Crunkball 4000
description:
Spaceship bumper car soccer, 2D rocket league... Crunkball 4000!!!

Hit the moon into the enemy goal ring! 

Impress the snarky announcer! 

CONTROLS: WASD to accelerate & turn.

Multiplayer only. Bring a few friends and hop on discord for the best experience.

CrunkNation discord: https://discord.gg/jwRf2TpvAv
